message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper is about information retrieval using neural models, which is a core topic in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. The paper also mentions using article content as documents, which suggests a natural language processing (cs.CL) component. The use of filters and heuristics to generate effective training data suggests a machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) component. Finally, the use of state-of-the-art neural IR models suggests a deep learning (cs.DL) component.
